[00:00.00]More Time (Explicit) - Pop Smoke
[00:01.02]Lyrics by：Nicholas Britell/Bashar Jackson/Steven Victor
[00:02.04]Composed by：Nicholas Britell/Bashar Jackson/Ricardo Lamarre/Jason Avalos/Steven Victor
[00:03.06]Oh nah nah nah nah nah
[00:03.77]
[00:04.68]Keep the intro
[00:05.02]
[00:06.80]Oh my boy you already know
[00:08.62]
[00:12.31]Ah
[00:12.86]More time
[00:13.35]
[00:14.30]Melly and D-Nice still in the cage more time
[00:16.68]
[00:17.50]That ain't gon' stop us from getting paid more time
[00:19.93]
[00:20.76]Certain things ain't never gonna change never speak to them guys without your lawyer
[00:25.61]'Cause they giving more time
[00:26.35]
[00:27.38]My mans died I put him on a chain more time
[00:29.83]
[00:30.61]A lot of n***as can't handle the pain more time
[00:32.97]
[00:34.00]I'm a hard animal to tame saw my son killer sitting on the train
[00:38.40]Give a n***a more time
[00:39.29]If my mans down n***a I up and get 'em
[00:41.34]Max Payne I'm doing TECs and Berettas
[00:42.95]Never trust a boy it's always a setup
[00:44.59]If I see an opp I bet I'ma wet 'em
[00:46.16]New speed I bet I change up the level
[00:47.91]Make it rain I bet I change up the weather
[00:49.51]To walk through I need twenty five and better
[00:51.07]Old hundreds have 'em sticking together
[00:52.20]
[00:52.81]Louis V and Amiri the denim
[00:54.43]My mans up top rocking Gucci sweaters
[00:55.46]
[00:56.00]Red bottoms Rollies in the pen
[00:57.23]
[00:57.81]Pinky ring Cartier lens
[00:59.03]
[00:59.58]Ride around big body Benz
[01:00.56]
[01:01.10]Blacked out all you see is tints
[01:02.21]
[01:02.80]See me I ain't worried 'bout men
[01:04.40]Act up get a shot to your chin
[01:05.60]
[01:06.16]Hollow tips got acquired taste
[01:07.75]Gas straight but my brother an ape
[01:09.37]Catch a body then I'm back in the cave
[01:11.03]If you don't got a body you can't relate
[01:12.64]If you don't bang you can't get in the car
[01:14.32]Big woo know I'm shooting them stars
[01:16.01]Mama begging me to pray to Allah
[01:17.66]Walk in the mall n***as know who we are
[01:19.35]Forty-one millimeter plain jane
[01:20.47]
[01:20.99]N***as get locked up start naming names
[01:22.61]P***y n***a get the f**k out my way
[01:24.26]Ma I'm sorry I'm just stuck in my ways
[01:25.53]
[01:26.41]Hello
[01:27.02]Black hair by the Regis and Pello
[01:28.64]I like my b***h Spanish she yellow
[01:29.82]
[01:30.47]Her a*s fat feel like Jello
[01:31.66]
[01:32.32]She said she want Chane-ne
[01:33.17]
[01:33.78]Pop Smoke on the TV
[01:35.10]Ah
[01:35.54]I did fifteen on my check-ins
[01:36.71]Yeah
[01:37.12]She said she didn't believe me
[01:38.26]Nah
[01:38.72]Until I pulled up in a foreign
[01:39.91]Ah
[01:40.38]And I cashed out on a TD
[01:41.51]
[01:42.18]Snowman like Jeezy
[01:43.03]
[01:43.87]VS I'm freezing
[01:44.74]
[01:45.62]Red bottoms I'm bleeding
[01:46.46]
[01:47.15]Louboutin when I'm stepping
[01:48.03]
[01:48.67]Stone Cold what I'm repping
[01:49.68]
[01:50.37]Big .38 for the weapon
[01:51.56]Ah
[01:51.72]
[01:52.63]Man down check the scoreboard
[01:54.09]I'm a bulldog with this .44
[01:55.01]
[01:55.70]Break legs like Paul George
[01:56.63]
[01:57.27]Said I break legs like Paul George
[01:58.34]
[01:59.40]Grrt
data.trans:
[ti:More Time (Explicit)]
[ar:Pop Smoke]
[al:Faith (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.02]//
[00:02.04]//
[00:03.06]//
[00:03.77]
[00:04.68]保留这段序曲
[00:05.02]
[00:06.80]我的朋友 你已经知道
[00:08.62]
[00:12.31]//
[00:12.86]更多的时间
[00:13.35]
[00:14.30]Melly和D-Nice还要在监狱里待更长的时间
[00:16.68]
[00:17.50]这无法阻止我们赚钱 拥有更多的时间
[00:19.93]
[00:20.76]有些事情永远不会改变 没有律师的陪同 不要跟他们讲话
[00:25.61]因为他们会让你的刑期变长
[00:26.35]
[00:27.38]我的朋友离开人世 我会长时间佩戴项链 以此纪念他
[00:29.83]
[00:30.61]许多人无法长时间地承受痛苦
[00:32.97]
[00:34.00]我是个桀骜不驯的人 看见我的杀手坐在火车里
[00:38.40]给我更多时间
[00:39.29]如果我的朋友倒下了 我会大展拳脚
[00:41.34]就像《英雄本色》里的一样 我拿着TEC冲锋枪和贝雷塔枪
[00:42.95]不会相信任何人 这一直都是圈套
[00:44.59]如果我看见敌人 我一定会把他们打得落花流水
[00:46.16]全新的速度 我打赌我更进一步
[00:47.91]任由大雨倾盆 我打赌我能够改变天气
[00:49.51]安然度过困境 我需要二十五万甚至更多的钱
[00:51.07]陈旧的百元大钞 让他们团结一致
[00:52.20]
[00:52.81]路易威登和Amiri牛仔裤
[00:54.43]我的朋友屹立巅峰 穿着古驰毛衣招摇过市
[00:55.46]
[00:56.00]脚踩红底鞋 戴着劳力士手表
[00:57.23]
[00:57.81]小拇指戴着卡地亚宝石戒指
[00:59.03]
[00:59.58]驾驶着奔驰四处兜风
[01:00.56]
[01:01.10]一片漆黑 你只能看见黑色的车窗玻璃
[01:02.21]
[01:02.80]你瞧 我不会担心任何人
[01:04.40]装腔作势 打爆你的下巴
[01:05.60]
[01:06.16]中空的子弹变成后天养成的嗜好
[01:07.75]横冲直撞 我的兄弟不是好惹的
[01:09.37]干掉一个人 然后我回到山洞里
[01:11.03]如果你没有动过手 你无法理解
[01:12.64]如果你没有浴血奋战 你无法钻进车里
[01:14.32]我所向披靡 你知道我志存高远
[01:16.01]妈妈恳求我向神明祈祷
[01:17.66]走进商场 大家知道我们的真面目
[01:19.35]四十一毫米的手表 朴实无华
[01:20.47]
[01:20.99]哥们被关进监狱里 开始取名字
[01:22.61]怂货 不要挡我的路
[01:24.26]我很抱歉 我只是我行我素
[01:25.53]
[01:26.41]你好
[01:27.02]Regis和Pello让我拥有一头黑发
[01:28.64]我喜欢我的西班牙妹子 她是混血美女
[01:29.82]
[01:30.47]她的臀部丰满Q弹
[01:31.66]
[01:32.32]她说她想要 香奈儿
[01:33.17]
[01:33.78]Pop Smoke登上电视荧屏
[01:35.10]//
[01:35.54]我出道没多久就挣了一百五十万
[01:36.71]//
[01:37.12]她说她不相信我
[01:38.26]//
[01:38.72]直到我开着进口车现身
[01:39.91]//
[01:40.38]我在一家TD银行兑换现金
[01:41.51]
[01:42.18]浑身珠光宝气 就像是Jeezy
[01:43.03]
[01:43.87]质量上乘的钻石 我瑟瑟发抖
[01:44.74]
[01:45.62]脚踩红底鞋 好像我鲜血淋漓
[01:46.46]
[01:47.15]我穿的鞋子是Christian Louboutin
[01:48.03]
[01:48.67]当我开口时 我就化身成为冷血人
[01:49.68]
[01:50.37]武器是0.38口径的枪
[01:51.56]//
[01:51.72]
[01:52.63]有人应声倒下 查看计分板
[01:54.09]我就像是凶狠的斗牛犬 拿着这把0.44口径的枪
[01:55.01]
[01:55.70]打断双腿 就像是Paul George
[01:56.63]
[01:57.27]我说我打断双腿 就像是Paul George
[01:58.34]
[01:59.40]//
